effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.3 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 630,538.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,634, further increased by 954 while you remain within its light.
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 710,431 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
